links.quantification: Traceability → 100% EPR compliance verification (vs. 40% self-reported) → ₹15K Cr in recycling investments triggered → circular economy accountability
Formal recycler integration → 2M waste pickers gain EPR contracts → ₹20K/month wages (vs. ₹8K informal) → livelihood formalization
Plastic recovery → 60% reduction in waste burning → PM2.5 from open fires -40% → ₹5K Cr health benefits annually
E-waste collection → 70% toxic leachate prevention → groundwater contamination avoided → ₹3K Cr remediation costs saved
Producer resistance: Traceability exposes 60% non-compliance → ₹20K Cr compliance costs → lobbying to weaken enforcement
Digital infrastructure gap: Blockchain EPR needs municipal IT capacity → ₹2K Cr investment + 3-year capacity building
Plastic recovery → marine pollution -50% → ecosystem health improves → fisheries recover → economic benefits reinforce compliance (virtuous)
Requires social security integration: Waste picker EPR participation only sustainable with health insurance + pension → ESIC/PF coverage prerequisite
Via compliance funding: EPR fees → ₹10K Cr for municipal recycling infrastructure → city waste management capacity improves
Via burning reduction: PM2.5 decline → respiratory health improves → community productivity +8% → economic co-benefits
Via marine recovery: Coastal fisheries rebound → fishing community incomes +25% → livelihood resilience improves
